sen.j: 岩倉具成（いわくら ともなり、寛文8年（1668年）‐延宝8年（1680年））は、江戸時代前期の廷臣。
sen.e: Tomonari IWAKURA (1668 - 1680) was a retainer of Imperial Court who lived in the first half of the Edo period.
Tomonari IWAKURA (1668 - 1680) was a retainer of Imperial Court who lived during the first half of the Edo period.
Tomonari IWAKURA (1668 - 1680) was a retainer of Imperial Court who lived during the first half of the Edo period.
His father was Tomoaki IWAKURA, Sangi (a councilor).
His father was Tomoaki IWAKURA, Sangi (councilor).
His father was Tomoaki IWAKURA, Sangi (councilor).
Who was his mother is unknown.

sen.j: 岩倉家の当主の一人ではあるが、13歳にして早世している。
sen.e: Though being one of the heads of the Iwakura family, he died young at the age of 13.
Though being one of the heads of the Iwakura family, he died young at the age of thirteen.
Though being one of the heads of the Iwakura family, he died young at the age of thirteen.

sen.j: 官位も従五位下止まりだった。
sen.e: His last official court rank was only Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).
His last official court rank was only Jugoinoge (Junior 5th Rank, Lower Grade).
His last official court rank was only Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade).

sen.j: 岩倉家の家督は千種有維からの養子岩倉乗具が継いだ。
sen.e: The line of the Iwakura family was inherited by Noritomo IWAKURA, the adopted son who was a son of Arikore CHIGUSA.
The line of the Iwakura family was inherited by Noritomo IWAKURA, the adopted son who was a son of Arikore CHIGUSA.
The line of the Iwakura family was inherited by Noritomo IWAKURA, the adopted son who was a son of Arikore CHIGUSA.
